flawed_nl_solution:
The first garden has 2 tomato plants because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=2>>2
The second garden has 5 tomato plants because 15 x (1/3) = <<15*(1/3)=5>>5
She has 7 tomato plants in total because 2 + 5 = <<2+5=7>>7
She has 35 plants in total because 20 + 15 = <<20+15=35>>35
The proportion of tomato plants is 0.02 because 7 / 35 = <<7/35=0.02>>0.02
The percentage of tomato plants is 2 because 0.02 x 100 = <<0.02*100=2>>2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.2, not 0.02. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
